turn.2: SMS Nürnberg (1906) SMS "Nürnberg" ("His Majesty's Ship "Nürnberg""), named after the Bavarian city of Nuremberg, was a light cruiser built for the German Imperial Navy ("Kaiserliche Marine").
turn.3: What were some of her sisters?
turn.6: She was built by the Imperial Dockyard in Kiel, laid down in early 1906 and launched in April of that year.
turn.8: She was completed in April 1908. "Nürnberg" was armed with ten guns, eight SK L/55 guns, and two submerged torpedo tubes.
